about_the_game:
Survive solo in Campaign Mode or with friends in Multiplayer Mode. The goal of Cyber War Apocalypse is to Survive. To do this you will need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst & exhaustion. Craft items to help you on your journey. Build shelter. Hunt animals for food and crafting materials. Scavenge the world for crafting items. In multiplayer mode, you'll need to Protect yourself from other players and Create alliances or become their enemy. It presents combat, crafting, looting, scavenging, resource mining, and exploration.

What to expect?

● Explore - Grab a friend and explore a unique and rich open-world environment
● Craft - Advance crafting system. Craft and repair tools, clothes, armor, vehicles, gadgets, weapons, traps, explosives and much more.
● Build – Decide with a friend to take an abandon house/building or build from the ground-up. Design the ultimate base to include traps, electric power, lights, storage, auto turrets, gadgets and much more to survive the undead and enemy forces. Build together with a friend in Multiplayer Mode.
● Combat – Encounter other players, infected zombies, a range of cult rebels and empire soldiers, wild animals and much more. All with unique behaviors and attacks.
● Survive – Experience real survival mechanics with hunger, thirst and exhaustion
● Weather - Dynamic weather system will give you random rain and snow storms with a day and night cycle.
● Loot – Scavenge the world for the best guns, weapons, tools, armor, clothing, gadgets and more. Loot other players stashes and dead bodies
● Quest – Meet Trader NPCs to buy and sell goods. Quest NPC's will give you the direction to important POI's
● Drive – Enjoy the vehicle system where you ride solo or with a friend in the passenger seat. Find all the parts and craft your own vehicle like an ATV or search and find different cars, trucks, ATV's and more.
● Hunt – Head out into the wilderness and hunt a variety wild animals. Salvage meat and crafting materials. Cook the meat on a crafted camp fire for safe consumption and use the materials for a crafting recipe.
● Cooperate or Compete – Work together cooperatively to build HUGE bases or work against each other raiding other player’s bases, it’s really up to you in an apocalypse wasteland where other players, aggressive wild animals, zombies, rebels and an evil army rules the land.
● Create – Unleash your creativity and build the ultimate base with friends.
● Full Multiplayer Chat - Accept/Send invites, block/unblock players, create clans, create groups and control clan role settings.
● Farming - Build a Farm with your friends! Find some seeds while scavenging. Plant and Harvest crops. Use water sprinklers, fertilizer, heat and indoor lighting to make your plants grow faster.

Game is still in Development
More Features Are Being Added.
This Description will be updated

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (recommended)

short_description: This unique open-world game is a 1st/3rd person shooter, survival/horror role-playing game. The goal is to Survive. Overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst & exhaustion. Build shelter. Use Advanced Crafting. Clear enemy Outpost. Survive solo in Campaign Mode or with friends in Multiplayer Mode.
